sentences.en: Although the Egyptians were warlike, they found times for peaceful games.
sentences.cn: 尽管埃及人很好战, 然而他们发现这项有利于和平的运动.
他们是好战的民族 吗 ?

sentences.en: Bellicose: Warlike in manner or temperament; pugnacious.
sentences.cn: 好战的: 在行为方式或性格上好战的; 好斗的.

sentences.en: Costly take with warlike machine joking, can quits people is estimated to giant national defence criticism.
sentences.cn: 把昂贵和战争机器拿来开玩笑, 能抵消人们对庞大的国防预算的批评.

sentences.en: Directed by the warlike Inanna, he penetrates the Sinai peninsula, invades Egypt.
sentences.cn: 受到好战的伊娜娜指引, 他渗透西奈半岛, 入侵埃及.

sentences.en: Each of the three new traits fits the warlike nature of the expansion.
sentences.cn: 三个新特性中的每一种都对应于资料片的战争属性.

sentences.en: Some people used to regard China as a warlike country.
sentences.cn: 过去,在国际上有人认为中国是“好战”的.

sentences.en: Sword - Indicates the bearer to a just and generous pursuit of honor and virtue in warlike deeds.
sentences.cn: 长剑 - 象征剑的佩有者在格斗中具备公正、宽恕的美德.

sentences.en: The Scythians were a fiercely warlike people.
The Spartans were a warlike people.
sentences.cn: 斯巴达人是尚武的民族.

sentences.en: They originated from the nomadic, warlike tribes known as the Qiang.
sentences.cn: 他们来自尚武的游牧民族──羌.

sentences.en: They were armed with spears and other warlike implements.
sentences.cn: 他们用矛和其他作战工具武装自己。
他们穷兵黩武，帝国主义色彩浓厚。

sentences.en: We should sit, well as studying warlike popularly, study China year answer a year spring carry.
sentences.cn: 我们应该坐下来, 好好地如同研究战争一般地, 研究中国的年复一年的春运.

words.tran_cn: 战争，斗争；军事，战术；冲突，对抗，竞争
好战者；战争贩子；主战论者
进行战争（war的现在分词形式）
战争的；好战的；有战争危险的

trans.tran_cn: 好战的，尚武的，军事的，与战争有关的
trans.tran_en: liking war and being skilful in it
